original_text: The men from the city said, ‘Do not try to stop us! You are a stranger here in this city. You cannot tell us what to do! Be careful or we will do even worse things to you.’ They pushed against Lot and tried to reach the door of his house. They wanted to break the door and go in to the house.
korean_text: 그들이 이르되 너는 물러나라 또 이르되 이 자가 들어와서 거류하면서 우리의 법관이 되려 하는도다 이제 우리가 그들보다 너를 더 해하리라 하고 롯을 밀치며 가까이 가서 그 문을 부수려고 하는지라

sentences.original_text: The men from the city said
Do not try to stop us!
You are a stranger here in this city
You cannot tell us what to do!
sentences.korean_translation: 우리에게 무엇을 하라고 말할 수 없다!

sentences.original_text: or we will do even worse things to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇지 않으면 우리가 너에게 더 나쁜 일을 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and tried to reach the door of his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 집 문에 닿으려고 했다

sentences.original_text: They wanted to break the door
and go in to the house
